title: Google Pixel 3 blue stripes on display edges
content:
Has this issue been previously solved? The blue stripes on edges of my Pixel 3 showed up after nearly 1 year use. I would like to know if this can worsen throughout time or not (I wouldn't like to waste my time for RMA). 

• The blue stripes are visible only on hard light.

• The blue stripes are not visible in the dark when the display is on.

• The blue stripes don't disappear when the phone is off.

I tested the display with several apps and it has been responding well. I haven't tried factory reset yet but will in a few hours.

Any ideas?
